channel.title: Blockchain on Going the distance
channel.description: Recent content in Blockchain on Going the distance

item.title: Building Blockchain in Go. Part 1: Basic Prototype
item.description: Introduction Blockchain is one of the most revolutionary technology of the 21st century, which is still maturing and which potential is not fully realized yet. In its essence, blockchain is just a distributed database of records. But what makes it unique is that it’s not a private database, but a public one, i.e. everyone who uses it has a full or partial copy of it. And a new record can be added only with a consent of other keepers of the database.
